title: I Have to Come Clean...

The WEIRDEST Games of All Time:  PS6 REVEALED*   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Is Austin Lying?! 1:20 Austin takes it off 1:59 The rules 2:44 The interrogation begins.. 3:44 What is your net worth..? 4:40 Are you a robot? 5:35 Did you burn down your house? 6:46 Personal questions 7:50 WikiFeet questions 8:40 Austin gets scared 9:29 The machine has detected irregularities 10:24 What were the lies? 11:24 Off the charts 12:28 Austin is EXPOSED 13:29 Does This Is have good videos??
